definition: a boom (i.e. transverse beam for hanging objects)
to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
a string of 100 cash (arch.)/to lament/to condole with/variant of 吊[diao4]
stick/pole/lever/classifier for long objects such as guns

sentences.english: All derricks lowered down and secured.
sentences.chinese: 所有的吊杆已经落下并绑牢。

sentences.english: Lower down and secure all derricks and report.
These booms are to stop the traffic for passing trains.
sentences.chinese: 这些吊杆是用来为过路火车通过而拦住交通的。

sentences.english: Keep safe working load of derricks.
sentences.chinese: 让吊杆在安全负荷下工作。

sentences.english: This article introduces an integrated protection system of platform booms.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了组态王软件在舞台吊杆系统中的应用。

sentences.english: Non-heating stretching pipe hanger should be fixed vertically.
sentences.chinese: 无热伸长的管道吊架，吊杆应垂直安装。

sentences.english: General cargo is loaded and unloaded by cranes or ship's own derricks .
sentences.chinese: 纯货用讫重机或用船舶大家的吊杆装卸。

sentences.english: What's the safe working loadS. W. L of each derrick?
sentences.chinese: 每个吊杆的安全工作负荷是多少？

sentences.english: You have derricks at all the hatches, don't you?
sentences.chinese: 你们所有舱口都有吊杆是吗？

sentences.english: The next step is to test the strength of the shaft.
sentences.chinese: 下一步将是测试吊杆的强度。

sentences.english: Accidents of fixed derricks of the floating crane often occur in the seaway.
sentences.chinese: 固定式起重吊杆在海上出事故的情况经常发生。

sentences.english: Self-produced stray current can severely corrode the metallic boom of hanging type anode.
sentences.chinese: 自生杂散电流会严重腐蚀悬挂式阳极的金属吊杆。

sentences.english: One crane dipped into No. 2 hold and came up with a "Shanghai" sedan.
sentences.chinese: 一架起重机的吊杆伸入二号舱，吊出一辆上海牌轿车。

sentences.english: We still have to wrestle with hangers and clips to hang clothes.
sentences.chinese: 我们仍然要角力与吊杆和剪辑坑的衣服。

sentences.english: Now the question is whether we can take the two excavators with your jumbo boom.
sentences.chinese: 现在的问题是能否用你们的重吊杆搬这两台掘土机。

sentences.english: Put the suspension coop on the base, install suspension shaft and hand crane.
sentences.chinese: 将吊笼放到底座上，装上吊杆及手摇起重机。

definition: rope tackle hanging from a mast/crow foot (system of ropes through tackle to hold up an awning)
to support/to bear the weight of (a building)
a building/the frame of a building/roof beam/truss
to construct by hoisting ready-built components into place
